details.description:
The session gives you hands on experience with arranging, cleaning and dashboarding data. Starting with the basics, discover what a schema is and why you should care. Learn how to check if data matches the schema using cleaning tools, before creating an interactive dashboard.

<< Back to full schedule

Suitable for

Anyone who works with spreadsheets and is interested in creating a dashboard.

About the trainer: Dr Dave Tarrant

Dr David Tarrant joined the Open Data Institute from the University of Southampton where he was a Lecturer in the Web and Internet Science Group. David has over 12 years of experience with the open agenda including a PhD on measuring the impact of open science. Before leaving the University, David created the first undergraduate course focussing on open data science. This highly acclaimed course encourages students to think critically about the opportunities to exploit open data commercially.
